TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataFormats extends System.Object
public ref class DataFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組預先定義的資料格式名稱，這些名稱可用以識別剪貼簿或拖放作業中可用的資料格式。

span.span: Provides a set of predefined data format names that can be used to identify data formats available in the clipboard or drag-and-drop operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其他類別可實作介面使用靜態格式所定義來描述每個資料物件中儲存的資料格式。The class and other classes that implement the interface use the static formats defined by to describe each data format that is stored in a data object. 資料物件通常用於來回傳輸資料和系統剪貼簿、 拖放作業中。Data objects are typically used for transferring data to and from the system clipboard, and in drag-and-drop operations. 下表列出所提供的格式的靜態資料欄位的值。The following table lists the values of the static data format fields provided by . 欄位會提供這些值僅供參考之用;一般情況下，程式碼應該一律會參考適當的欄位，而不是硬式編碼的字串。These field values are provided for informational purposes only; in general, code should always refer to the appropriate field, rather than hard-coded strings. |欄位Field|欄位值Field Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------|-----------------| ||「 點陣圖 」"Bitmap"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 點陣圖資料格式。Specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] bitmap data format.| ||"CSV""CSV"|指定逗號分隔值 (CSV) 資料格式。Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) data format.| ||"DeviceIndependentBitmap""DeviceIndependentBitmap"|指定裝置獨立點陣圖 (DIB) 資料格式。Specifies the device-independent bitmap (DIB) data format.| ||"DataInterchangeFormat""DataInterchangeFormat"|指定 Windows 資料交換格式 (DIF) 資料格式。Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF) data format.| ||"EnhancedMetafile""EnhancedMetafile"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 加強型中繼檔格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] enhanced metafile format.| ||"FileDrop""FileDrop"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 檔案置放格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file drop format.| ||"HTML Format""HTML Format"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] data format.| ||「 地區設定 」"Locale"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 地區設定 (文化特性 (Culture)) 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] locale (culture) data format.| ||"MetaFilePict""MetaFilePict"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 中繼檔圖片資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] metafile picture data format.| ||"OEMText""OEMText"|指定標準 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] OEM 文字資料格式。Specifies the standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] OEM text data format.| ||"Palette""Palette"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 調色盤資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] palette data format.| ||"PenData""PenData"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 畫筆資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] pen data format.| ||"RiffAudio""RiffAudio"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] 音訊資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] audio data format.| ||"Rich Text Format""Rich Text Format"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] data format.| ||"PersistentObject""PersistentObject"|指定用以封裝任何型別之可序列化資料物件的資料格式。Specifies a data format that encapsulates any type of serializable data objects.| ||"System.String""System.String"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 字串類別資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] string class data format.| ||"SymbolicLink""SymbolicLink"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 符號連結資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] symbolic link data format.| ||"Text""Text"|指定 ANSI 文字資料格式。Specifies the ANSI text data format.| ||"TaggedImageFileFormat""TaggedImageFileFormat"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] data format.| ||"UnicodeText""UnicodeText"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文字資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] text data format.| ||"WaveAudio""WaveAudio"|指定 Wave 音訊資料格式。Specifies the wave audio data format.| ||"Xaml""Xaml"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] data format.| ||"XamlPackage""XamlPackage"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 封裝資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] package data format.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Bitmap As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 點陣圖資料格式。

span.span: Specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] bitmap data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點陣圖表示電腦圖形中記憶體的位元陣列，這些位元表示的影像中的個別像素的屬性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CommaSeparatedValue As String

summary.span: 指定逗號分隔值 (CSV) 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這種格式是常用的試算表的基本交換格式。This format is a basic interchange format commonly used by spreadsheets. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dib As String

summary.span: 指定 DIB 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the DIB data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DIB 是設計是為了確保可載入和顯示在另一個應用程式的確切它們是出現在原始的應用程式使用一個應用程式所建立的點陣圖形檔格式。DIB is a file format designed to ensure that bitmapped graphics created using one application can be loaded and displayed in another application exactly the way they appeared in the originating application. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dif As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 資料交換格式 (DIF) 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF) data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 差異是 ASCII 碼，可以協助使用它們，並將傳輸到其他程式化資料庫、 試算表，以及相似的文件所組成的格式。DIF is a format consisting of ASCII codes in which database, spreadsheet, and similar documents can be structured to facilitate their use by and transfer to other programs. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EnhancedMetafile As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 加強型中繼檔格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] enhanced metafile format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加強型中繼檔格式是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]物件而不是像素為單位的方式儲存影像圖形的檔案。The enhanced metafile format is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 當調整大小，中繼檔將保存優於點陣圖的影像。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FileDrop As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 檔案置放格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file drop format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此格式與殼層檔案拖曳互動拖放作業期間。Use this format to interact with shell file drags during drag-and-drop operations. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件會定義指定之資料格式的名稱與數值 ID。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for a specified data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也可用來註冊新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它會自動註冊為新的資料格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DataFormat GetDataFormat(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataFormat (id As Integer) As DataFormat

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: id
param.span: 要求 物件之資料格式的數值 ID。

span.span: The numeric ID of the data format to request a object for.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件會定義指定之資料格式的名稱與數值 ID。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for the specified data format.

summary.span: 所要的資料格式是由數值 ID 所指定。

span.span: The desired data format is specified by numeric ID.

returns.span: 物件，這個物件包含所要求之資料格式的數值 ID 與名稱。

span.span: A object that contains the numeric ID and the name of the requested data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也可用來註冊新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它會自動註冊為新的資料格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DataFormat GetDataFormat(string format) cil managed

param.span: 要求 物件之資料格式的名稱。

span.span: The name of the data format to request a object for.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件會定義指定之資料格式的名稱與數值 ID。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for the specified data format.

summary.span: 所要的資料格式是由名稱 (字串) 所指定。

span.span: The desired data format is specified by name (a string).

returns.span: 物件，這個物件包含所要求之資料格式的數值 ID 與名稱。

span.span: A object that contains the numeric ID and the name of the requested data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也可用來註冊新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它會自動註冊為新的資料格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format. 使用這個方法需要呼叫端具有與 Use of this method requires that the caller have with the 設定旗標。flag set. 下列程式碼顯示的屬性語法來要求這個使用權限的組件。The following code shows the attribute syntax to request this permission for an assembly. ```csharp [assembly: SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.RequestMinimum, Flags = UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard)] ``` ```vb ```

span.span: is .

permission.span: 用來存取支援剪貼簿格式註冊的低階 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for accessing low-level unmanaged code that supports the registration of clipboard formats.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Html As String

summary.span: 指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly MetafilePicture As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 中繼檔圖片資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] metafile picture data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中繼檔圖片格式是 Windows 檔案的方式儲存影像的圖形物件，而不是像素為單位。The metafile picture format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 當調整大小，中繼檔將保存優於點陣圖的影像。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly PenData As String

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] pen data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 畫筆資料是由手寫軟體的筆畫所組成。 pen data consists of pen strokes for handwriting software. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Riff As String

summary.span: 指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] 音訊資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] audio data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_riff](~/includes/tla2sharptla-riff-md.md)] 是以多元的規格，設計成可用於定義不同類型的多媒體檔案的標準格式。 is a broad-based specification, designed to be used in defining standard formats for different types of multimedia files. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Rtf As String

summary.span: 指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RTF 為調適用於傳輸的文件內容架構的應用程式之間的文字文件的格式。RTF is an adaptation of Document Content Architecture that is used for transferring formatted text documents between applications. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Serializable As String

summary.span: 指定用以封裝任何型別之可序列化資料物件的資料格式。

span.span: Specifies a data format that encapsulates any type of serializable data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SymbolicLink As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 符號連結資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] symbolic link data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 符號連結是磁碟目錄項目會取代檔案的目錄項目，但實際上不同的目錄中的檔案的參考。A symbolic link is a disk directory entry that takes the place of a directory entry for a file, but is actually a reference to a file in a different directory. 符號連結可能也需要參考的別名、 捷徑、 軟式連結或符號連結。A symbolic link may also be referred to an alias, shortcut, soft link, or symlink. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Text As String

summary.span: 指定 ANSI 文字資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the ANSI text data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Tiff As String

summary.span: 指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_tiff](~/includes/tla2sharptla-tiff-md.md)] 標準檔案格式通常用於掃描、 儲存體，以及交換的灰階圖形影像。 is a standard file format commonly used for scanning, storage, and interchanges of gray-scale graphic images. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly UnicodeText As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文字資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] text data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此資料格式表示 16 位元的字元編碼的 Unicode，也稱為 8、UTF-16 和 ucs-2。This data format denotes 16-bit character encoded Unicode, also referred to as UTF-16, and UCS-2. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Xaml As String

summary.span: 指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 是 XML 架構語言，用來代表物件的樹狀結構。XAML is an XML-based language used to represent a tree of objects. 這些物件所產生的事件可以使用任何處理[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]程式設計語言。Events generated by these objects can be handled using any [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] programming language. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常用來描述使用者介面 (UI)、 文件和媒體經驗。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is typically used to describe user interfaces (UI), documents, and media experiences. 此欄位由類別和其他類別可實作介面來描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位方法，將資料與對應的格式加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位方法來擷取對應的格式中的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用格式的方法來查詢。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.
